description:
Learn the basic concepts, tools, and functions that you will need to build fully functional Linux CentOS Server and prepare for the Treasureboat Deployment.

This tutorial is for beginners as well as for experts as an reference guide.

  • Linux Server Installation and Configuration
  • Prepare the Server for Treasureboat
  • Learn something about TBMonitor and TBTask
  • Learn how you can use Treasureboat for an live environment
  • If you like, you can get with this course a 2 month root server for free

Learning the fundamentals of a Treasureboat deployment. CentOS and Treasureboat Basic is free, easy to learn for Linux administrators or Java programmers.

Content and Overview Suitable for beginning programmers, through this course over 30 lectures and 2 hours of content, you'll learn all of the Treasureboat fundamentals and establish a understanding of the concept behind Treasureboat. Each chapter closes with quizzes, putting your new learned skills into practical use immediately.

Starting with the installation of the Linux Server, this course will take you through linux configuration files and how to use them.

Students completing the course will have the knowledge to create a full functional and secure Server.

Complete with pdf documentation files and samples, you'll be able to work alongside the author as you work through each concept, and will receive a verifiable certificate of completion upon finishing the course.
title: Create a Treasureboat deployment CentOS Server from scratch
